name: Retro Sparkle
description:
Fast-paced, quick reflex match-3 game! All-in-one amazing package. 15 animated particle sticker pack of explosions, sparkles, and fireworks.

Game Info:
* 3 seconds to match-3. That's basically the game. 
* Swipe up/down or left/right in the grid. Do it fast because you only get 3 seconds to make a match. 
* If you succesfully match 3 shapes, you get 3 more seconds to find a new match.

Sticker pack Info:
* You can hold and drag the sticker to peel it off the sticker area and into your chat. 
* Pinch to zoom to resize the sticker.
* Rotate to rotate the sticker. 

 It will take a little practice so please have patience when learning these gestures.

Other feature:
* Match more than 3 to gain higher multipliers
* Challenge your friends' high score on the Game Center leaderboard.
* Day/Night modes

We love feedback! Good or bad! Rate and leave a review. This way, we can improve the experience for you.

Music by Rob Miller.
